security_audit.summary: This is a legitimate markdown-to-HTML converter skill. The static findings are false positives - external commands invoke the rendering script and external tools (PlantUML, Ruby) for markdown extensions, network calls fetch external resources needed for rendering (images, diagram servers), and filesystem operations are standard read/write for file conversion. No malicious intent or data exfiltration detected.

medium_findings.title: External Command Execution
medium_findings.description: The skill uses spawnSync to execute the markdown rendering script via npx/bun. This is legitimate functionality for invoking the markdown processor.
medium_findings.confidence_reasoning: External command is used to invoke the markdown renderer, which is the core functionality of this skill. Arguments are hardcoded, no user input injection.

medium_findings.title: Network Requests for Remote Images
medium_findings.description: The skill downloads remote images referenced in markdown files. This is standard functionality for a markdown converter.
medium_findings.confidence_reasoning: Network calls are used to download images embedded in markdown files - a legitimate feature for offline HTML rendering.

low_findings.title: Environment Variable Access
low_findings.description: The skill reads environment variables for debug configuration. This is a standard practice.
low_findings.confidence_reasoning: Environment access is used for DEBUG logging configuration, not for sensitive operations.

low_findings.title: Temporary File Operations

low_findings.confidence_reasoning: Temp files are created for intermediate processing during markdown-to-HTML conversion.

Keep markdown files in the same directory as referenced images for proper embedding
Test the output in WeChat editor before publishing to catch formatting issues

faq.question: What themes are available?
faq.answer: Three themes are available: default (classic WeChat style), grace (elegant with shadows and rounded cards), and simple (modern minimalist).

faq.question: Do I need to install anything?
faq.answer: You need Bun runtime installed. The skill will use npx/bun to execute the conversion script.

faq.question: Can I use this for WeChat articles?
faq.answer: Yes, the default and grace themes are specifically optimized for WeChat Official Account articles.

faq.question: How are remote images handled?
faq.answer: Remote images are automatically downloaded and embedded with local paths in the HTML for offline viewing.

faq.question: What markdown extensions are supported?
faq.answer: Code highlighting, math equations (KaTeX), PlantUML diagrams, footnotes, alerts, and custom infographics.

faq.question: Can I customize the output theme?
faq.answer: Yes, you can provide custom CSS variables through the EXTEND.md configuration file.
